Amakumo_Fruit.description: The fruit of the Amakumo Grass, which grows on Seirai Island. You can hear it crackling with a tiny current if you hold it up to your ear.
Amakumo_Fruit.name: Amakumo Fruit

Beryl_Conch.description: A conch-like structure that gives off a faint glow. Despite the name, it is not a shell but something condensed from pure elemental energy.
Beryl_Conch.name: Beryl Conch

Brilliant_Chrysanthemum.description: A flower with a shape like floating wings. Its petals sway in an unbelievably relaxed, serene manner as they are caressed by the wind.
Brilliant_Chrysanthemum.name: Brilliant Chrysanthemum

Calla_Lily.description: A flower that grows near water sources. When cooked the petals have a chunky texture, yet are sweet and a little bitter.
Calla_Lily.obtained:
- Found near laktes
- Found in Springvale
- Sold by Flora
Calla_Lily.name: Calla Lily

Cecilia.description: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.
Cecilia.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Starsnatch Cliff
- Sold by Flora
- Given by an NPC at the top of Starsnatch Cliff
- Given by the nun in front of Mondstadt's cathedral
Cecilia.name: Cecilia

Clearwater_Jade.description: Jade from Chenyu Vale. Named for its cool, refreshing touch, that is much like clear water.
Clearwater_Jade.obtained:
- Found in Chenyu Vale
- Found on Jadestone Turtles
- Sold by Fengtai
Clearwater_Jade.name: Clearwater Jade

Cor_Lapis.description: A precious crystal of condensed pure Geo element that usually grows along with other minerals. It's also commonly called "Cor Petrae."
Cor_Lapis.obtained:
- Found under cliffs in Liyue
- Found in Mt. Hulao
Cor_Lapis.name: Cor Lapis

Crystal_Marrow.description: A crystal that contains a sliver of Tatarigami power. Adding this material during smelting will greatly increase the strength and toughness of metals.
Crystal_Marrow.obtained: - Found in the wild around Kannazuka and Yashiori Islands
Crystal_Marrow.name: Crystal Marrow

Dandelion_Seed.description: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.
Dandelion_Seed.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found at Mondstadt's front gates
Dandelion_Seed.name: Dandelion Seed

Dendrobium.description: A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.
Dendrobium.name: Dendrobium

Dracolite.description: Formed gradually in areas rich in Phlogiston, these red, scale-like crystals are blazing-hot to the touch.
Dracolite.name: Dracolite

Fluorescent_Fungus.description: A mushroom that glows like a night-light. Some curious power lies hidden within it.
Fluorescent_Fungus.obtained: - Found in the wild on Tsurumi Island
Fluorescent_Fungus.name: Fluorescent Fungus

Frostlamp_Flower.description:
A flower that resembles a candle lamp, commonly found near water. It emits a cold, simple aroma that has a calming effect.
The contrasting colors of its stamen and stem are thought to symbolize the two different types of kuuvahki, yet despite this symbolism, it is one of the few rare plants that are immune to kuuvahki's influence. As a result, the Frostmoon Scions sometimes regard it as a symbol of faithlessness and apostasy.
It is said that this strangely shaped flower first appeared at the end of the dark calamity five hundred years ago, but this claim has never been rigorously verified.
Frostlamp_Flower.obtained:
- Found in Nod-Krai
- Sold by Richeza
Frostlamp_Flower.name: Frostlamp Flower

Glaze_Lily.description: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.
Glaze_Lily.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Sold by Ms. Bai
- Found in Qingce Village
- Found in Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor
Glaze_Lily.name: Glaze Lily

Glowing_Hornshroom.description: A fungus that emits a faint light in the darkness. It is so named because its shape resembles the crest of an Iktomisaurus.
Glowing_Hornshroom.name: Glowing Hornshroom

Henna_Berry.description: A fruit that grows even in the most hostile of desert environments. It's vibrant crimson fruits are made even more lovely against a backdrop of yellow sand.
Henna_Berry.name: Henna Berry

Jueyun_Chili.description:
A spicy plant native to Liyue.
Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.
Jueyun_Chili.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Qingce Village
- Sold at Wanmin Restaurant
Jueyun_Chili.name: Jueyun Chili

Kalpalata_Lotus.description: Flowers from vines that grow on cliff sides. It is called a lotus only because it has a similar appearance to one. Aside from that, it bears no other similar properties to the lotus.
Kalpalata_Lotus.obtained: - Found in the mountains of Sumeru
Kalpalata_Lotus.name: Kalpalata Lotus

Lakelight_Lily.description: A clear and clean azure flower, it is born where Water Veins come together. It has a simple, cool, and elegant fragrance, pungent and refreshing yet gentle.
Lakelight_Lily.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Erinnyes Forest
Lakelight_Lily.name: Lakelight Lily

Lumidouce_Bell.description: A serene and tranquil violet flower. It has a light, soft, and lasting scent and is often used for making luxurious perfumes.
Lumidouce_Bell.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in the north of the Court of Fontaine
- Gardening with Luxuriant Glebe
Lumidouce_Bell.name: Lumidouce Bell

Lumitoile.description: A soft-bodied animal that emits a gentle light. Often found climbing the walls of buildings near the water or underwater.
Lumitoile.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Liffey Region
Lumitoile.name: Lumitoile

Moonfall_Silver.description:
A silver crystal as pure and pristine as moonlight. It possesses almost perfect elemental affinity.
In the legacy of the Frostmoon Scions, these crystals were born five hundred years ago alongside the Moon Maiden, and were believed by the Moonchanter at the time to be a gift from the moon, hence the name "Moonfall Silver". However, in older documents written by Snezhnayan chroniclers, the descendants of the golden realm were already using secret silver woven by the Frostmoon thousands of years in the past. The threads that connect these two tales are unclear — the only certain thing is that these crystals make excellent elemental conductors in the eyes of Nod-Krai's craftspeople.
Moonfall_Silver.name: Moonfall Silver

Mourning_Flower.description: Crimson flowers that bloom on ancient battlefields. They can even flourish in the depths of the desert. Their drooping flowers seem to be in mourning for heroes long past.
Mourning_Flower.obtained:
- Found in the deserts of Sumeru
- Found in the Asipattravana Swamp
Mourning_Flower.name: Mourning Flower

Naku_Weed.description: Even on windless days, this plant will tremble lightly amid the cries of thunder. The part of it that resembles petals are in fact extensions of the leaves meant to protect the fragile flower.
Naku_Weed.obtained:
- Found near Mikage Furnace
- Sold by Aoi
Naku_Weed.name: Naku Weed

Nilotpala_Lotus.description: Growing in the forest wetlands, these plays only bloom at night with flowers as bright as the moon.
Nilotpala_Lotus.obtained: - Found near lakes and river banks in Sumeru
Nilotpala_Lotus.name: Nilotpala Lotus

Noctilucous_Jade.description: A rare mineral that glimmers in the dark. It's said to be a mutated gemstone condensed from the flourishing elements of the world.
Noctilucous_Jade.obtained:
- Found in caves in Liyue
- Found in Mingyun Village
- Sold by Shitou
Noctilucous_Jade.name: Noctilucous Jade

Onikabuto.description: A strange beetle that inhabits areas rich with Electro energy. Its docile and sedentary temperament could not be more different from the fierce, demonic visage displayed on its armored shell.
Onikabuto.name: Onikabuto

Padisarah.description: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.
Padisarah.name: Padisarah

Philanemo_Mushroom.description: A fungus that grows in the warm caress of the wind. It is as everlasting as the wind, nourishing life.
Philanemo_Mushroom.obtained:
- Found under the eaves of houses
- Sold by Chloris
Philanemo_Mushroom.name: Philanemo Mushroom

Pine_Amber.description: A gem formed from the resin of the towering ancient trees that once blanketed Nod-Krai. Over ages, the resin hardened into crystalline amber, now shining with vivid, radiant hues.
Pine_Amber.obtained:
- Found in Dreadshade Mire
- Recommendation: Found near the Favonius Keep
- Grown in Serenitea Pot
Pine_Amber.name: Pine Amber

Portable_Bearing.description:
A portable bearing of a type that was mass-produced after the Fatui moved into Nod-Krai. Excessively worn units are discarded like obsolete personnel.
A few of them have a vestige of kuuvahki left inside. As they are difficult to imitate, they are occasionally used as currency by merchants in Nasha Town.
It's said that people tried to forge these bearings for that reason, but went bankrupt in the end because the cost of forging them was higher than their market value.
Portable_Bearing.name: Portable Bearing

Qingxin.description: A translucent white flower that only grows on the highest stone peaks. It eschews the warmth and moisture of the plains to gaze out afar from the solitary mountaintops.
Qingxin.obtained:
- Found in the heights of stone forests
- Sold by Bubu Pharmacy
- Found in Guyun Stone Forest
- Found in Jueyun Karst
Qingxin.name: Qingxin

Quenepa_Berry.description: Bluish, juicy berries that grow in large amounts near the Scions of the Canopy. Their shape is similar to that of Flamegranates.
Quenepa_Berry.name: Quenepa Berry

Rainbow_Rose.description: A delicate and tender pink flower. Despite their name, Rainbow Roses are essentially more akin to Lilies.
Rainbow_Rose.name: Rainbow Rose

Romaritime_Flower.description: An ethereal and elegant blue flower. Its tender petals are elastic and water-absorbent, making it the ideal raw material for various daily necessities.
Romaritime_Flower.obtained:
- Diving
- Sold by Hinterman and Xana
Romaritime_Flower.name: Romaritime Flower

Rukkhashava_Mushrooms.description: A fungus that grows in layers upon layers, like a sea of clouds, and which mostly grows on trees deep in the rainforest. Therefore, they are considered by the people of Sumeru to be the holy crystallization of Rukkhadevata’s legacy.
Rukkhashava_Mushrooms.name: Rukkhashava Mushrooms

Sakura_Bloom.description: Blossoms from the Sacred Sakura at the Grand Narukami Shrine, filled with a fondness for Inazuma.
Sakura_Bloom.obtained:
- Found in the wild around Narukami Island
- Found near the Grand Narukami Shrine
Sakura_Bloom.name: Sakura Bloom

Sand_Grease_Pupa.description: You can only find such husks deep in the desert where the Quicksand Eels breed. The hardened shell is meant to protect the Quicksand Eels' larval bodies until they finally acclimate to the conditions of the dry desert.
Sand_Grease_Pupa.obtained: Found in the deserts of Sumeru
Sand_Grease_Pupa.name: Sand Grease Pupa

Sango_Pearl.description: A precious pearl that grows in the coral of Watatsumi. Gives of a cool sheen like that of a moonlight.
Sango_Pearl.name: Sango Pearl

Saurian_Claw_Succulent.description: A meaty plant shaped like the paw of a great animal.
Saurian_Claw_Succulent.name: Saurian Claw Succulent

Scarab.description: A tenacious beetle that finds repose within the vast ocean of desert sand. The golden pattern on such beetles' shells hints at some deep relationship between them and the ancient ruins that dot the desert.
Scarab.name: Scarab

Sea_Ganoderma.description: A plant species that only grows in certain regions and islands of the ocean. Though it looks like a fungus of some sort, it actually comes from a substance secreted by certain soft-bodied organisms.
Sea_Ganoderma.obtained:
- Found in the wild of the Golden Apple Archipelago (Event)
- Found on beaches and tidal flats of Inazuma
- Sold by Obata
- Gardening with Orderly Meadow
Sea_Ganoderma.name: Sea Ganoderma

Silk_Flower.description: A crimson flower that blooms like the rainbow clouds in Liyue. It can be made into silky-smooth fabric.
Silk_Flower.obtained:
- Found near Yujing Terrace, Liyue Harbor
- Sold by Ms. Bai
- Found near Wangshu Inn
Silk_Flower.name: Silk Flower

Skysplit_Gembloom.description: A strange plant whose flower's exterior resembles stone. Only in bloom does it reveal a resplendent, crystal-like core.
Skysplit_Gembloom.name: Skysplit Gembloom

Small_Lamp_Grass.description: A wild grass that emits light at night. Used in cooking to enhance other flavors.
Small_Lamp_Grass.obtained:
- Found in the wild at night
- Found in Wolvendom
- Found in the Whispering Woods
- Sold by Flora
Small_Lamp_Grass.name: Small Lamp Grass

Sprayfeather_Gill.description: A special feather-shaped species of plant that grows by the seaside. It looks kind of like a seagrass but is in truth a soft-bodied aquatic coral with a unique shape.
Sprayfeather_Gill.name: Sprayfeather Gill

Spring_of_the_First_Dewdrop.description: A limpid drop of dew floating amidst the waters of Morte Region. It is different from other pure water bodies, as though it is a conglomeration of even more pure and primordial Elemental Energy.
Spring_of_the_First_Dewdrop.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found underwater in Morte Region
Spring_of_the_First_Dewdrop.name: Spring of the First Dewdrop

Starconch.description: Empty seashells brought ashore by the tides. Hold it close to your ear, and hear the longing calls of the sea.
Starconch.obtained:
- Found on the beaches of Liyue
- Found on the frigid coastlines of Dragonspine closer to Liyue
Starconch.name: Starconch

Subdetection_Unit.description: Detection units produced by Fontaine Research Institute using new models of artificed components. Its original purpose was monitoring all kinds of environmental data.
Subdetection_Unit.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Fontaine Research Institute of Kinetic Energy Engineering Region
Subdetection_Unit.name: Subdetection Unit

Trishiraite.description: A splendorous stone that can be found in the depths of desolate mountains, seemingly formed from congealed elemental energy.
Trishiraite.obtained:
- Found in the deserts of Sumeru
- Found in Temir Mountains
Trishiraite.name: Trishiraite

Valberry.description: A plump and translucent berry that has a fragrant smell and a sweet refreshing taste. In the past, The watchers of the storms found solace in the sweetness of the fruit and the hope for the city's security.
Valberry.obtained:
- Found in the wild around Stormbearer Mountains
- Sold by Chloris
Valberry.name: Valberry

Violetgrass.description: A small flower with strong vitality. It was said its downward-blooming flower keeps its fragrance from dissipating.
Violetgrass.obtained:
- Found near cliffs in Liyue
- Sold by Verr Goldet
- Sold at Bubu Pharmacy
Violetgrass.name: Violetgrass

Windwheel_Aster.description: A plant that adores the wind. To the proud children of the wind, or the citizens of Mondstadt, the Windwheel Asters are the "visible winds."
Windwheel_Aster.obtained:
- Found near the Statue of The Seven at Windrise
- Found under trees in the wild
- Found in Stormterror's Lair
- Sold by Flora
Windwheel_Aster.name: Windwheel Aster

Winter_Icelea.description: A hardy plant known for withstanding relentless wind and frost, it survives even in the coldest depths of winter.
Winter_Icelea.obtained:
- Found in Pillar of Embla/Nod-Krai
- Grown in Serenitea Pot
Winter_Icelea.name: Winter Icelea

Withering_Purpurbloom.description: A flower, the leaves and petals of which look scorched and withered, that can often be seen in places where ash abounds.
Withering_Purpurbloom.name: Withering Purpurbloom

Wolfhook.description: A berry with thorns that often gets attached to a wolf's pelt. When you look at it, you can almost hear the echoing cries of the wolves in the woods.
Wolfhook.obtained:
- Found in the wild
- Found in Wolvendom
- Sold by Chloris
Wolfhook.name: Wolfhook
